name: UnityActivateLicenseTask
description: Activates a Unity license on the agent.
helpMarkDown: Activates a Unity license on the agent. [More Information](https://github.com/Dinomite-Studios/unity-azure-pipelines-tasks)
author: Dinomite Studios

inputs.name: unityProjectPath
inputs.label: Unity Project Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: (Optional) Enter the directory path to the Unity project. If no value is entered, the root of the repository will be used.

OutputVariables.name: projectVersion
OutputVariables.description: The project version found by the task for the specified Unity project.

messages.InputProvisioningProfileNotFound: Provisioning profile to be installed was not found at %s. Specify the full file path to a provisioning profile.
messages.InstallRequiresMac: Install Apple Provisioning Profile requires a macOS agent. Installing on Windows or Linux is not supported by Apple.
